column1: Uchi////- Desserts: Fry Milk and Peanut Butter Semifreddo something : the most expected ones for me. Nice garnish and arrangement
column2: The Fry milk had chocolate mouse
column6: which is the highlight. The Semifreddo had some moose
column7: raisin and peanut sugar. It's good nut but it's not mind blowing
column8: it's not the best dessert I've ever had
column9: it's not unique or the must-try.
